description technical detail:
Acer V176Lb 17" LED VGA Monitor
Essential series monitor features Acer eColor technology for striking visuals, and Acer ComfyView innovations that reduce glare for comfortable viewing. This sturdy monitor also has a wide array of ports, so you can connect many types of devices and do more at once. In addition, it utilizes eco-friendly features to save power and money.
